Keywords: Fantastic Four , Frightful Four , Monster
Real Name: Sharon Ventura
Special Powers
FRIGHTFUL FOUR: IF YOU DON'T WANT ME: UNIQUE MODIFIER - Friendly characters with the Frightful Four keyword modify damage +1 when attacking only characters that share a keyword with them.
COMING AFTER THOSE THAT HURT ME: Leap/Climb. When She-Thing uses it, after resolutions she may make a close attack.

Comments
February 19, 2021
Goop
She's has the most useless effect of all the FF but she does bring the highest damage. Pretty much 11/4 through the whole dial. I'm assuming she can still do her free attack under the new Leap/climb 2021 rules but losing the auto breakaway definitely hurts her. I think she's a bit overcosted now that indom isn't really a thing anymore. Better options out there. Sideline her in case you see a lot of shape change.
July 10, 2020
THEALLAMERICAN
Guess I'll be gluing a Ben Grimm on this dial as he didn't get one this good...
June 20, 2020
spider_ham
Great design for Sharon. I'm holding out hope that the Fast Forces version (or a "human" version in the main set) gets the Celebrity keyword to play with WWE.
June 20, 2020
surrealhero1019
What a good bruiser! 8 range L/C then close attack, picking up an object on the way with Willpower to use said object next turn is great. Sure, that 17 defense is easy to hit but played smartly she could be a real pain, especially against no damage reduction.
